amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit State Department Remote Work Agreements which allow a domestically assigned employee's alternative worksite to be located outside of the locality pay area of the regular worksite.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Hageman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
